sponsor: U.S. Army Medical Research and Development Command
briefTitle: HIV Vaccine Trial in Thai Adults
officialTitle: A Phase III Trial of Aventis Pasteur Live Recombinant ALVAC-HIV (vCP1521) Priming With VaxGen gp120 B/E (AIDSVAX B/E) Boosting in HIV-uninfected Thai Adults

interventions.name: ALVAC-HIV vCP1521 + AIDSVAX
otherNames: Bivalent HIV gp120 vaccine subtype B (MN), and E (A244)

interventions.name: ALVAC Placebo + AIDSVAX Placebo
otherNames: ALVAC carrier lyophilized product without virus

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether immunizations with an integrated combination of ALVAC-HIV (vCP1521) boosted by AIDSVAX gp120 B/E prevent HIV infection in healthy Thai volunteers.

primaryOutcome.measure: Kaplan-Meier Estimate of HIV-1 Infection Rate in Intent to Treat Population
